float32.name: HDAO Ambient Shadow
float32.tooltip: how much ssao shadowing darkens the ambient lighting

float32.name: HDAO Point Shadow
float32.tooltip: how much ssao shadowing darkens the point lighting ie the sun

float32.name: Sharp Ambient Shadow
float32.tooltip: how much the sharp dynamic shadows darken ambient lighting

float32.name: Sharp Point Shadow
float32.tooltip: how much the sharp dynamic shadows darken the point lighting ie the sun

float32.name: Maximum Intensity
float32.tooltip: unshadowed areas will have this relative intensity

float32.name: Minimum Intensity
float32.tooltip: fully shadowed areas will have this relative intensity

float32.name: Falloff Width
float32.tooltip: controls the shape of the shadow falloff curve

float32.name: Corner Bias
float32.tooltip: offsets corner sensitivity, generally to ignore shallow corners

float32.name: Bounds Scale
float32.tooltip: controls the maximum shadow distance, as a ratio of the distance to the object

float32.name: Bounds Offset
float32.tooltip: offsets the maximum shadow distance, generally to make a region of full darkness before fading

float32.name: Near Clip
float32.tooltip: completely removes ssao on anything closer than this

float32.name: Near Fade Width
float32.tooltip: distance over which the ssao fades in

float32.name: Far Clip
float32.tooltip: completely removes ssao on anything farther than this

float32.name: Far Fade Width
float32.tooltip: distance over which the ssao fades in
